articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Ryugyong Pickle Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Ryugyong Pickle Factory
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC) and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the newly-built Ryugyong Pickle Factory.
					 The factory is a modern pickle production base built under the loving care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He set all the problems arising in the construction of the factory, noting that it was needed to build a modern pickle factory with large capacity whose industrialization is put on a higher level in order to supply Pyongyang citizens with taste pickles on a normal basis in all seasons, and named it "Ryugyong Pickle Factory".
					
					 True to his noble intention, officials, scientists, technicians and builders built in the suburbs of Pyongyang the factory with a total floor space of more than 15 660 square meters that is able to produce over 4 200 tons of pickles a year.
					
					 Kim Jong Un went round different parts of the factory to learn in detail about the technical specifications of its production processes and equipment.
					
					 Noting that the production process of whole cabbage kimchi, hot pickles of chopped radishes and pickling are furnished with modern equipment designed by our scientists and technicians and manufactured by our own efforts, he gave a high appreciation of the fact that many successes were made in implementing the Party's localization policy.
					
					 It is the Party's intention to build the Ryugyong Pickle Factory into an icon and standard unit for the country's kimchi industrialization, he said, giving instructions for its materialization.
					
					 He stressed the need to build a modern pickle factory in each province on the basis of the experience gained from the construction of the Ryugyong Pickle Factory.
					
					  Kimchi is one of the Korean nation's most favorite traditional dishes and it is well-known as one of the world's five health foods, he said, urging the factory to make it more delicious than that produced by individual households and thus make it a favorite dish of the citizens and the best food in the world.
					
					 He expressed his conviction that the officials and employees of the factory would produce various kinds of fresh pickles with high nutritive value and peculiar taste to supply to the public catering establishments in the city of Pyongyang and its citizens and thus make positive contribution to the improvement of people's diet.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Chairman O Su Yong, Department Director An Jong Su and vice department directors Jo Yong Won and Sin Man Gyun of the WPK Central Committee and Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Heads of Party and State of Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Heads of Party and State of Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent messages to heads of party and state of foreign countries in reply to their congratulatory messages on his election as chairman of the WPK.
					 Among them were Filipe Jacinto Nwussi, president of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party, Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of DR Congo, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, president of Angola, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda and chairman of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, and Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of Egypt. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed deep thanks for their warm congratulations and best wishes and expressed belief that friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and those countries would grow stronger. 
					
					 He also sent a reply message to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, in reply to his congratulatory message and floral basket on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Make Bold Decision, Facing Up to Trend of Times
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Make Bold Decision, Facing Up to Trend of Times
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The participants in the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations sent an open letter to the United States of America on Friday.
					 The letter said that it is the invariable desire and wishes of the Korean people to achieve the eternal prosperity of the nation in a peaceful world and build a reunified prospering country.
					
					 The new line and policies for national reunification laid down at the historic Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea held recently are the historic declaration of weighty significance in settling the issue of the Korean peninsula and ensuring global peace, it noted.
					
					 If one has a right thinking and judgment, one cannot but sympathize with the stand of the DPRK that the issue of national reunification should be settled in line with the will and wishes of the Korean nation responsible for the issue by its concerted efforts and recognize its validity, the letter said.
					
					 But only the U.S., far from properly complying with the due demand of the DPRK, is persistently stemming the trend of history toward peace and reunification through its dishonest assertions and belligerent acts and also drawing its followers into its moves, the letter charged.
					
					 The joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations held on June 9 as regards the prevailing situation decided to send an open letter to the U.S., reflecting the following principled stand of the DPRK:
					
					 Firstly, the U.S. should make a bold decision to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK which should not be pursued any longer.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK which has been pursued since its founding is a blatant challenge to the aspiration, desire and just cause of the Korean people to protect their ideology, social system, sovereignty and vital rights.
					
					 Though belatedly, the U.S. should make a reasonable judgment for itself and make a political bold decision to valiantly root out its hostile policy toward the DPRK which was wrong from the outset and whose fatal consequences can hardly be counted.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to choose a new way of thinking and opt for new practice, away from the old framework of its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK which has shackled its thinking and practice for a long period. This would be the wisest attitude which it can take and which can be welcomed.
					
					 Secondly, the U.S should immediately stop arms buildup and the exercises for a war against the DPRK in south Korea, the root cause of escalating tension, and take the new road of ensuring genuine peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is not the U.S. but the DPRK, which has emerged victorious in political, military and moral terms in the confrontation that has lasted century after century and won laurels as the strong.
					
					 The U.S. has anxiously waited for what it called "collapse" while channeling all efforts into the campaign for isolating, blockading and putting military pressure on the DPRK and for provoking a war. Now it might have realized how ignorant and foolish it has been.
					
					 The way of settling an issue with a rival possessed of nuclear weapons should be shown by the U.S. itself.
					
					 The U.S. had better think twice over the lesson of history reflected in the bitter confession made by a defeated general that he fought a wrong war with a wrong rival in wrong time in wrong place and frankly accept the DPRK's just peace initiative and proposal before missing an opportunity.
					
					 Thirdly, the U.S. should refrain from the foolish act of meddling in the internal affairs of the Korean nation, fostering confrontation and blocking its independent reunification any longer.
					
					 The U.S. is the main stumbling block in the way of settling the issue of Korea's reunification as it is stoking hostility and stand-off between the north and the south and escalating tensions by interfering in the internal affairs of the nation.
					
					 The desire, wishes and demands of the Korean nation serve as the standard and yardstick for settling the issue of the destiny of the Korean nation, the matter of reunification, under any circumstances and the U.S. neither has anything to do with this nor has any right to meddle in it.
					
					 The U.S. should give a clear answer to the Korean nation's solemn question as to whether it will be shamefully driven out of Korea after facing a stern punishment in the world's eyes or take hands off the Korean issue and quit south Korea of its own accord as befitting "American gentleman."
					
					 It should no longer stem the strong trend of the history of the nation advancing toward independence, peace, reconciliation, unity, reunification and prosperity but stop the foolish act of hurling a handful of pro-U.S. stooges into sowing seeds of discord among Koreans and fostering confrontation.
					
					 History and time will clearly prove that this warning served by the DPRK to the U.S. is by no means an empty talk.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, we would like to express the conviction that the fair-minded and sensible figures and people of broad strata in the U.S. would positively respond to the fair and aboveboard, peace-loving and sincere appeal of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Portugal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Portugal 
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greeting to Marcelo Rebelo De Sousa, president of the Portuguese Republic , on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished president success in his wok for the development of the country.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to FM of Turkey
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to FM of Turkey
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Mevlut Cavusoglu, foreign minister of Turkey, as regards terrorist attack in Istanbul, Turkey which claimed huge human losses. 
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the bereaved families of victims, reaffirming the DPRK government's principled stand against all forms of terrorism, and hoped that the people of Turkey would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster as early as possible and bring peace and stability.

articles.title: Workers, Farmers, Students Meet
articles.content:
Workers, Farmers, Students Meet
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place at industrial establishments, cooperative farms and universities and colleges across the country to vow to thoroughly implement the decision made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and become honorable victors in the 200-day campaign of loyalty.
					 Reporters and speakers said that all party members, working people and youth are filled with the enthusiasm to fully display once again the high spirit and invincible might of Juche Korea by becoming honorable victors in the 200-day campaign of loyalty for making a breakthrough towards carrying out the five-year strategy for the state economic development in hearty response to the call of the great party.
					
					 They pledged to glorify this year as a year of great victory to be specially recorded in the history of the country by steadily registering the biggest successes and performing the greatest labor feats at the new Mallima speed, bearing in mind the militant appeal of the party.
					
					 They called for continuing to create legendary tales about heroes in the era of Mallima during the 200-day campaign of loyalty for thoroughly implementing the decision made at the 7th Congress of the WPK and thus making a positive contribution to bringing earlier the final victory in the drive for building a socialist power.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, Friday hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club to mark the national day of the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, Hwang Ho Nam, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were present.
					
					 A reception was also given at the consulate general of the Russian Federation in Chongjin on the same day.

articles.title: Delegation of Lao Women's Union Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Lao Women's Union Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Women's Union headed by Inlavanh Keobounphanh, president of its Central Committee who is a member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, Friday left here for home.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from C.C., Communist Party of Russian Federation
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
					 Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and first vice-chairman of the Central Council of the Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, conveyed the gift to Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, on June 7.

articles.title: 53rd National Sports Contest of Juvenile Sports Schools Closes
articles.content:
53rd National Sports Contest of Juvenile Sports Schools Closes
 Kowon, June 10 (KCNA) -- The 53rd national sports contest of juvenile sports schools closed with due ceremony in Kowon County on Friday.
					 Present there were officials concerned, players and schoolchildren in Kowon County.
					
					 Trophy cups and medals were awarded to the units and players who proved successful in the contest.
					
					 Kim Pyong Sik, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made a closing address.

articles.title: Posters Produced to Arouse All Service Personnel and People to 200-Day Campaign of Loyalty
articles.content:
Posters Produced to Arouse All Service Personnel and People to 200-Day Campaign of Loyalty
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House produced posters dynamically arousing all service personnel and people to the 200-day campaign of loyalty to carry out the decision made at the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					 A poster bearing the slogan "Let us all turn out in the 200-day campaign of loyalty!" depicts a builder who calls for coming out as one in the on-going general charge for bringing earlier the final victory in the drive for building a socialist power by bringing about a dynamic leap forward at the new Mallima speed of Juche Korea, holding aloft the banner of the three revolutions, the banner of self-development-first principle put up by the party.
					
					 Another poster "Let us become honorable victors in the 200-day campaign of loyalty!" depicts a furnace man full of pride and joy as an innovator after receiving a bouquet and garland. It calls upon all people to become honorable victors in the grand advance according to the bright blueprint unrolled at the historic 7th Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Promising Pianist
articles.content:
Promising Pianist
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Pak Kon Ui, a student of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, took the first place in the 22nd individual contest for February 16 art prize held few months ago. 
					 In the contest, Pak gave an excellent rendition of a piano concerto "Ode to Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					 He drew attention of experts from his days at primary school for extraordinary musical sensibility.
					
					 He proved successful at different international juvenile piano competitions including the 20th Tolyatsi international juvenile piano players concours.

articles.title: Successes Made in Medical Treatment
articles.content:
Successes Made in Medical Treatment
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK has made achievements in medical treatment by applying advanced methods.
					 The methods have proved successful in surgeries like gastric cancer and biliary plastic operations and operation on lumbar slipped disk.
					
					 What draws attention of medical workers is a new method of treating burns.
					
					 In the field of internal medicine, the college has registered achievements in putting medical service on a standardized and scientific basis. 
					
					 The hospital is striving to further improve medical service in hearty response to the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Worker's Party of Korea.

articles.title: Volleyball Team of Sosong District Juvenile Sports School
articles.content:
Volleyball Team of Sosong District Juvenile Sports School
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, Sosong District Juvenile Sports School in Pyongyang took the first place in the women's volleyball event at the 53rd National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools.
					 Its women's volleyball team has won titles at the annual national games of juvenile sports schools and juvenile championships.
					
					 In particular, it came under focus at the women's volleyball finals of the 2015 Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest.
					
					 Such success is attributable to coach An Nam Hui, a winner of the title of Merited Athlete who has devoted her all to training reserve players.

articles.title: Newspapers Mark Anniversary of June Popular Resistance in S. Korea
articles.content:
Newspapers Mark Anniversary of June Popular Resistance in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of the DPRK on Friday dedicate articles to the 29th anniversary of the June popular resistance in south Korea.
					 The June popular resistance was the eruption of the pent-up anger of the people at the U.S. imperialist colonial rule and the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist junta, the newspapers say.
					
					 Referring to the details of the resistance, the newspapers notes that the resistance clearly proved that nobody can overpower the strength of the popular masses who turned out for justice and truth and that when all the patriotic and democratic forces unite as one and struggle against the force of dictatorship, they will surely win victory.
					
					 The newspapers go on:
					
					 The resistance, however, taught a serious lesson that in order to win a decisive victory in the struggle for independence, democracy and reunification the south Korean people should not have any expectation and illusion about the fascist dictators but more dynamically struggle until the traitorous ruling quarters are buried to the last man.
					
					 This is proved by the events that took place after the resistance, says Rodong Sinmun, adding:
					
					 Now the south Korean ruling quarters in the grip of the extreme ruling crisis due to the total bankruptcy of their domestic and foreign policies seek a way out in strengthening the fascist dictatorial system and escalating the confrontation with the north. However, this frenzy would get them nowhere.
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors will not be able to escape a final destruction as they resort to the fascist dictatorship and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, going against the desire of the people and demand of the times.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the south Korean conservative authorities should bear in mind that they would certainly face a severe punishment by the times and history for persistently enforcing their treacherous rule quite contrary to the desire of the people for independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses Get Evermore Rampant in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses Get Evermore Rampant in S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Human rights abuses are getting evermore rampant in the south Korean puppet army.
					 It was disclosed that two officers committed violence against incoming officers in a unit of the puppet army in Kangwon Province of south Korea, according to Yonhap News of south Korea on June 1.
					
					 Those officers made nine incoming officers gather in a resting room at 2 a.m. on June 5 last year before threatening them with sticks and throwing desks and chairs at them, wounding them. They beat them at random in the end.
					
					 The then battalion commander of the unit had known the fact but covered up the incident and ordered the victims not to report about the violence.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Accused of Going Busy to Import American Rice
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Accused of Going Busy to Import American Rice
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations held a press conference outside the building of the "National Assembly" in Seoul on June 7 denouncing the puppet authorities for their sycophantic and treacherous moves to import American rice. 
					 The organization said that from the last year, opposition to the regime's move to import American rice is growing stronger not only among the peasants but also in the political camp and among local autonomous organizations.
					
					 The organization declared that it would launch an all-out action against the rice import, adding that it would stage a strong protest by starting a large-scale meeting of farmers on June 25.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report on Review of Work of C.C., WPK Carried by Egyptian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report on Review of Work of C.C., WPK Carried by Egyptian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The gist of the report made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at its 7th Congress was carried by the Egyptian newspaper Al Akhbar Almassay on June 3.
					 The report made by him on May 6 and 7, Juche 105 (2016) comprehensively deals with the proud successes and precious experience the WPK gained in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the great leaders and indicates in an all-round way the tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of socialism, realizing the country's independent reunification and global independence and steadily strengthening the WPK, regarding it as the supreme programme of the party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Austrian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on its website on June 1.
					 The work published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998) clarifies the five-point policy for great national unity, important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: WPK's Successful 7th Congress Observed in Russia and Belarus
articles.content:
WPK's Successful 7th Congress Observed in Russia and Belarus
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A lecture took place in Stavropol, Russia on June 3 and a seminar in Minsk, Belarus on June 5 in celebration of the successful 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and other figures congratulated the WPK upon its successful 7th Congress and praised President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un for building and leading the party.
					
					 They lauded Kim Jong Un who is leading the building of a socialist power to victory as a great man and wished the army and people of the DPRK bigger success in their struggle for implementing the tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Belarus (CPB) said in a speech that it was the great pride of his party to award its "loyalty" medal to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 He said that the congress clearly indicated the tasks and ways for building a socialist power and reunifying the country.
					
					 A secretary of the C.C., CPB and other speakers said that it is entirely just that the WPK is carrying forward the cause of building a socialist power by dint of ideology. We could not repress the admiration at the fact that in the DPRK youth are growing up to be the reliable successors to revolution, they said, adding: We should follow the idea of the WPK on attaching importance to youth.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the lecture held in Russia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Kimchi Ryugyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Kimchi Ryugyong
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la Fabrica de Kimchi Ryugyong, construida nuevamente. 
					Esta planta es una moderna base de produccion de Kimchi levantada gracias al amor paternal del Mariscal. 
					
					Diciendo que a fin de suministrar de manera normal en todas las estaciones el sabroso Kimchi a los capitalinos se necesita construir una moderna fabrica de Kimchi con gran capacidad que se realiza en el alto nivel la industrializacion, soluciono uno por uno los problemas pendientes en la construccion y la denomino personalmente como "Fabrica de Kimchi Ryugyong". 
					
					Gracias a los esfuerzos activos de los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y constructores, quienes se movilizaron en la obra guardando en lo profundo de su corazon el noble proposito del Mariscal, fue construida en el suburbio de la ciudad de Pyongyang la fabrica con la area construida total  de mas de 15 mil 660 metros cuadrados y capacidad de producir al ano mas de 4 mil 200 toneladas de Kimchi, las saladuras y otros.
					
					Recorriendo varios lugares de la fabrica, el Mariscal estudio detalladamente el caracter tecnico de los procesos productivos y las instalaciones.
					
					Dijo que los procesos de produccion de kimchi, kakdugi, las saladuras y otros estan equipados completamente con los modernos equipos disenados por nuestros cientificos y tecnicos y elaborados por su propia cuenta y evaluo que fueron logrados muchos exitos en la materializacion de la orientacion del partido en materia de asegurar la produccion basandose en los recursos nacionales.
					
					Senalo  que el partido tiene el proposito de acondicionar esta fabrica como unidad ejemplar de la industrializacion de kimchi y unidad de estandar del pais y dio las instrucciones sobre el respecto. 
					
					Anadio que en el futuro hay que construir las modernas fabricas de kimchi en todas las provincias a base de las experiencias adquiridas en la construccion de esta fabrica. 
					
					Subrayo que kimchi es uno de los platos nacionales mas preferidos para la nacion coreana y esta reconocido ampliamente en el mundo como uno de los cinco alimentos salubres. Acoto que la fabrica debe elaborar de manera industrial el kimchi mas sabroso que los elaborados en las casas y asi convertirlo en el plato afamado por nuestro pueblo y el sobresaliente mundial. 
					
					El Mariscal expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica haran aporte activo a la mejora de vida alimentaria del pueblo al producir el fresco kimchi nutritivo con el sabor del alimento tradicional de la nacion y suministralo a las redes de servicio comercial y a los ciudadanos de esta capital. 
					
					En esta ocasion, el Mariscal fue acompanado por O Su Yong, vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, An Jong Su, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won y Sin Man Gyun, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y Ma Won Chun, director de departamento de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a lideres de partido y Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a lideres de partido y Estado de varios paises 
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio mensajes de respuesta a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises quienes le hicieron llegar misivas felicitando su eleccion como Presidente del PTC.
					Entre los destinatarios figuran Filipe Jacinto Nwussi, Presidente del Partido Frente de Liberacion Nacional de Mozambique, Joseph Kabila Kabange, Presidente de la Republica Democratica del Congo, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, Presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, Presidente de la Republica de Angola, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, Presidente de la Republica de Uganda y Presidente del Movimiento Nacional de la Resistencia de Uganda y Abdel Fattah alÔºçSisi, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Egipto.
					
					En las misivas, el Mariscal les expreso profundo agradecimiento por haberle enviado calurosas felicitaciones y saludos de voto y manifesto conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los respectivos paises.
					
					Y emitio mensaje de respuesta a Mahmoud Abbas, Presidente del Estado de Palestina y Presidente del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina quien envio una carta de felicitacion y un cesto de flores con motivo del VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: Mensaje abierto a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Mensaje abierto a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- Los participantes en la conferencia conjunta del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enviaron el dia 10 un mensaje abierto a los Estados Unidos de America, que senala en particular:
					Lograr la eterna prosperidad nacional y construir la patria prospera reunificada en el mundo pacifico es la aspiracion invariable y la demanda del pueblo coreano.
					
					La linea y las orientaciones de la reunificacion de la patria, presentadas nuevamente en el recien VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, es la declaracion historica que tiene gran significacion en la solucion del problema de la Peninsula Coreana y el aseguramiento de la paz del mundo.
					
					Todos los hombres quienes tienen el correcto pensamiento y juicio simpatizaran con la posicion de la RPDC de solucionar el problema de reunificacion del pais con las propias fuerzas unidas conforme a la voluntad y la demanda de la nacion coreana y reconoceran su justeza.
					
					Pero, en vez de aceptar nuestra demanda justa, EE.UU. impide obstinadamente la corriente de la historia hacia la paz y la reunificacion con la insistencia injusta y la accion belicosa e introduce hasta las fuerzas seguidoras.
					
					En relacion con la situacion creada la conferencia conjunta del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la RPDC, convocada el 9 de junio decidio enviar a EE.UU. un mensaje abierto con nuestra posicion de principios siguientes:
					
					1. EE.UU. debe tomar la decision de abandonar su politica hostil a la RPDC que no debe ser practicada por mas tiempo.
					
					Esta politica, que se perdura desde la fundacion de la RPDC hasta la fecha, constituye un desafio brutal a la aspiracion, el anhelo y la causa justa del pueblo coreano para defender su idea y regimen y salvaguardar su soberania y su derecho a la existencia.
					
					Aunque sea tarde, EE.UU. debe hacer un juicio racional para si mismo y tomar una decision politica de erradicar la politica hostil a la RPDC, incorrecta desde el principio y que puede causar las consecuencias gravisimas.
					
					Tomar el nuevo pensamiento y nueva practica liberandose de la anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC que oprimio durante largo tiempo el pensamiento y practica de EE.UU., sera la mas el mas sabido procedimiento que puede hacer solo EE.UU. y es, digno de recibir aplausos.
					
					2. EE.UU. debe cesar ahora mismo las tentativas de aumento armamentista en el Sur de Corea y los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC, que originan la tension de la situacion, y entrar en nueva trayectoria para garantizar la paz y la seguridad verdaderas de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					No es EE.UU. sino la RPDC el que salio victorioso en lo politico, militar, espiritual y moral en la confrontacion historica de siglo en siglo.
					
					El imperio norteamericano, que ha esperado con ansiedad el "derrumbe" de la RPDC concentrando toda la fuerza en el aislamiento, bloqueo, aplastamiento militar y provocacion de guerra contra esta, podria entender hoy dia cuan absurdo e ignorante es el mismo.
					
					El mismo EE.UU. tiene que presentar el metodo de solucion a la contraparte, poseedora de armas nucleares.
					
					Seria mejor que recuerde la leccion de la historia reflejada en las palabras de un comandante norteamericano derrotado: la guerra coreana fue la cometida en un lugar inapropiado y en un tiempo inadecuado contra el rival equivocado, y que acepte de buena corazon la justa iniciativa y propuesta pacifistas de la RPDC antes de perder la oportunidad.
					
					3. EE.UU. no debe intervenir en los asuntos internos de la nacion coreana a fin de incitar la confrontacion y poner obstaculos ante la reunificacion independiente de Corea.
					
					El perturbador principal de la reunificacion de Corea es EE.UU. que interviene en los asuntos internos de la nacion para instigar la hostilidad y confrontacion y agravar la tension entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					La norma y la pauta para resolver el destino de la nacion coreana y la reunificacion de la patria devienen el anhelo, aspiracion y demanda de la misma nacion coreana y EE.UU. no  tiene ninguna relacion ni derecho a meterse alli.
					
					EE.UU. debe dar una respuesta clara a esta pregunta seria de la nacion coreana: ?se impulsara con verguenza tras ser castigado rotundamente ante todo el mundo? o ?se retirara por si mismo dejando de inmiscuirse en los asuntos coreanos, siendo "caballero americano"?
					
					El imperio no debe frenar mas la corriente de la historia nacional hacia la independencia, paz, reconciliacion, unidad, reunificacion y prosperidad y dejar de meter cizanas entre los connacionales y promover la confrontacion instigando a un punado de lacayos proyanquis.
					
					No es una palabra vana nuestra advertencia a EE.UU.
					
					Lo comprobaran la historia y el tiempo.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad expresamos la esperanza de que las personalidades de diversos estratos y habitantes concientes y juiciosos de EE.UU. respondan al llamamiento de la RPDC de caracter imparcial, pacifista y sincero.

articles.title: Canciller coreano expresa condolencias a su homologo de Turquia
articles.content:
Canciller coreano expresa condolencias a su homologo de Turquia
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, envio el dia 9 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo turco, Mevlut Cavusoglu, en relacion con que se produjeron muchas perdidas humanas por un ataque terrorista en Istanbul.
					El remitente expresa profundas condolencias a los familiares de victimas y reafirma la invariable posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de oponerse a todo tipo del terrorismo y desea que el pueblo turco eliminara cuanto antes las consecuencias de calamidad y recuperara la paz y la estabilidad.

articles.title: Efectuados mitines de fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades
articles.content:
Efectuados mitines de fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en las fabricas, empresas, granjas cooperativas y universidades de todas las localidades los mitines para materializar cabalmente la resolucion del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y ser triunfadores gloriosos en la campana de 200 dias.
					En las ocasiones hubo informes y discursos.
					
					Los oradores mencionaron que los militantes del Partido, los trabajadores y los jovenes estan entusiasmados para manifestar plenamente el impetu firme y el invicto poderio de Corea jucheana, al ser triunfadores honrosos en la campana de 200 dias de fidelidad para abrir brecha del cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo economico nacional en  acato al llamamiento del Partido.
					
					Ellos expresaron la decision de crear sin cesar con la nueva velocidad de Mallima los maximos exitos y proezas laborales respondiendo al llamamiento combativo del Partido y de esta manera, glorificar este ano significante como ano de grandes victorias, digno de registrarse en la historia de la patria.
					
					Y exhortaron a crear incesantemente nuevos mitos heroicos de la epoca de Mallima en la campana de 200 dias de fidelidad para materializar cabalmente la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC y aportar mucho a adelantar la victoria final de la construccion de la potencia socialista.
